Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1835 MARKET STREET,SUITE 2601, PHILADELPHIA, Pennsylvania, 19103, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Independence Realty Trust Inc is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that owns and manages apartment communities primarily in the Southeast and Midwest of the United States. It owns and operates multifamily apartment properties, across non-gateway U.S markets, including Louisville, Memphis, Atlanta, and Raleigh. The company is focused on gaining scale within key amenity rich submarkets that offer school districts, retail, and employment centers.
